ygData.subject: Re: Twinkers are just plain idiots
ygData.msgSnippet: ... dont assume. I m a monk, I dont kite, I dont twink (not yet at least). and no, I have not been nerfed.  just my inventory. and when you loose all your
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 20 Sep 1999, Imari J. A. Dellimore wrote:

> From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
> Variant didnt Nerf anyone!
> i assume that you are referring to the recently announced patch in which
> DOT were MODIFIED.

dont assume.

I'm a monk, I dont kite, I dont twink (not yet at least).

and no, I have not been nerfed. just my inventory.

and when you loose all your stuff ZONING, and they say "too bad, known
bug, shouldnt have zoned", you start to have a little different thinking
to twinking.
-------

on a side note, If verant wants to keep its player based economy, then
twinking will never be banned, and lvl limits will never be put in place.
The only way a player based economy works is if the currency is actually
worth something.

It is.

add level caps, or ban twinking, and you seriously devalue the currency,
turning the economy into a barter system.

-------

on a third note. What connotates twinking? is it buying stuff? I bought
my mesh, am I a twink?

I'm lvl 19, and I made 500pp yesterday. If I buy something nice with it,
am I a twink?
